<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2931</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">About Myself</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Über Mich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Au sujet de Me</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sobre Myself</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circa Me</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περίπου ο ίδιος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sobre Me</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A list of links to interactive activities and gameswhere the student learns vocabulary related to himself</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Liste der Links zu den interaktiven 
Aktivitäten und zum gameswhere der Kursteilnehmer erlernt den 
Wortschatz, der auf in Verbindung gestanden wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une liste de liens aux activités et au 
gameswhere interactifs l'étudiant apprend le vocabulaire lié à se</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma lista das ligações às atividades e ao 
gameswhere interativos o estudante aprende o vocabulário relacionado 
a himself</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lista dei collegamenti alle attività ed al 
gameswhere interattivi l'allievo impara il vocabolario relativo a sè</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας κατάλογος συνδέσεων με τις διαλογικές 
δραστηριότητες και gameswhere το σπουδαστή μαθαίνει το 
λεξιλόγιο σχετικό με τον</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una lista de conexiones a las actividades y al 
gameswhere interactivos el estudiante aprende el vocabulario 
relacionado con se</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

            <value>final</value>

          <contribute>

        <classification>
